summary: Contoso Wireless offers a range of internet packages with speeds up to 1000Mbps, no hidden fees, and unlimited data. Customers can save money with loyalty discounts and bundling services. Additionally, customers have access to 24/7 customer support, free installation and setup assistance, and free Wi-Fi hotspots across the country. Contoso Wireless also offers its Churn Prevention Program which rewards customers for staying with the service for longer periods of time with discounts and exclusive offers. All customers must sign a contract when signing up for the service which outlines all the details of their package.
